name: Beyond the Canopy Volume 2: Straw Man Argument
name_original: Beyond the Canopy Volume 2: Straw Man Argument
description:
As Friday Night Fisticuffs continues, Glenn begins to unravel the mysteries of the magic branch he obtained from the Forest's Navel. But when he is pitted against an old nemesis, will he have enough firepower to turn the tables on him? More importantly, what are Greliz's real motives for holding this competition?

178 pages! Contains chapters 5-7, and a host of other goodies, including profiles of the Friday Night Fisticuffs contenders, guest comics, concept sketches, and more!
